messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] More benefits to playing video games
messages.msgSnippet: I love the knowledge that the Wii improves your dopamine levels. Thanks for sending that. How very cool! Schuyler ________________________________ From: BRIAN
messages.messageBody:
I love the knowledge that the Wii improves your dopamine levels. Thanks for sending that. How very cool!

Schuyler




________________________________
From: BRIAN POLIKOWSKY <polykowholsteins@...>
To: unschoolingmn@yahoogroups.com; unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com; AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Cc: AlwaysUnschooled@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, 8 December, 2009 18:40:03
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] More benefits to playing video games

Here is a CNN video of more benefits fo playing video games.
They are using the Wii console to help people with Parkinson keep moving, avoid being depressed and how it stimulates them in a positive way.
And I still have friends that say video games will "rot the kids brains"!

http://us.cnn.com/video/?/video/health/2009/12/07/gupta.wii.rehab.cnn



Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow.blogspot.com/

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/



------------------------------------
